name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Design and development of structural and mechanical subsystems.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: Responsible for avionics, power distribution, and electronics design.

name: Structural Engineering
description: Analysis and verification of primary and secondary structures for loads, vibration, and fatigue.

name: Mechanisms Engineering
description: Design and testing of deployable structures, actuators, and moving hardware interfaces.

name: Systems Engineering
description: Cross-functional coordination of requirements, interfaces, and verification for the spacecraft.

name: Propulsion Engineering
description: Design, analysis, and testing of chemical and electric propulsion elements.

name: Flight Software Engineering
description: Development and validation of on-board flight software and control algorithms.
